part2.title: We build and scale game-changing digital products.
part2.title1: We've been in the digital trenches since 1996, obsessing over building and growing impactful online businesses. We offer a powerful toolkit to get you there:

first.head: Digital Transformation:
first.content: We guide you through a digital makeover that unlocks new possibilities.

second.head: Experience Design:
second.content: We craft intuitive and emotionally resonant experiences that keep your audience hooked.

third.head: Product Powerhouse:
third.content: From concept to launch and beyond, we ensure your product is a market leader.

fourth.head: Data-Driven Decisions:
fourth.content: We use data to make magic happen, optimizing your online presence for maximum impact.

fifth.head: Campaign Champions:
fifth.content: We plan and execute online campaigns that drive results.

sec1.title: Genesys
sec1.head: We wondered:
sec1.subhead: HOW INDIA’S MAPPING TECH COULD CATCH UP WITH THE WORLD?
sec1.content: We were tickled pink at the idea of tackling a project so large that it made Rocket science look easy! The result was a product that was both tech-savvy and scalable, that’s used by millions even today!

sec2.title: Rediff Money
sec2.head: We asked ourselves:
sec2.subhead: WHAT DO WE NEED TO BRING THE STOCK MARKET OFF THE SCREEN AND TO THE MASSES?
sec2.content: Building revolutionary tech? That’s just a regular Tuesday for the team. The outcome, a first-of-its-kind solution that took the financial sector in India by storm.
sec2.button: Here's what we came up with

sec3.title: UWC India Committee
sec3.head: Approached us:
sec3.subhead: WITH THE NEED FOR A SOLUTION TO STREAMLINE THEIR LARGE SCALE APPLICATIONS PROCESS
sec3.content: Was it a challenge to collate and streamline what was a multi-layered, multi-platform network of processes?
sec3.content1: Yes. Did we do it? Also yes.
